scripts.lighthouse: concurrently -n server,lh -c bgGray,bgBlue -k "yarn preview" "curl http://localhost:4173/ --connect-timeout 30 --retry 30 --retry-connrefused --retry-delay 1 --retry-max-time 30 && yarn just-lighthouse"
scripts.just-lighthouse: concurrently -n home,cards-a,cards-b,dice-a,dice-b -c bgBlue "lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --chrome-flags='--headless' --view --output-path ./lighthouse.1.html" "lighthouse http://localhost:4173/cards/4 --chrome-flags='--headless' --view --output-path ./lighthouse.2.html" "lighthouse http://localhost:4173/cards/200 --chrome-flags='--headless' --view --output-path ./lighthouse.3.html" "lighthouse http://localhost:4173/dice/6D20 --chrome-flags='--headless' --view --output-path ./lighthouse.4.html" "lighthouse http://localhost:4173/dice/100D1000 --chrome-flags='--headless' --view --output-path ./lighthouse.5.html"
